pages.title: Spectrum Pedestal
pages.text: The $(bold)Spectrum Pedestal$() is the block where you can make most of the recipes for Spectrum.$(br2)It requires air, or an inventory above it. To start crafting supply a redstone signal.

Most recipes require $(l:general/gemstone_powder)Gemstone Powder$() as an ingredient.$(br2)The Pedestal also acts as a normal crafting table and can therefore also craft vanilla recipes.$(br2)You can use $(l:general/crafting_tablet)Crafting Tablet() to automate spectrum and vanilla recipes.
